verses.text: \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“Speak \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Israelites \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w take|strong="H7311"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H6942"\w* twelve staffs, \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* leader \w of|strong="H1121"\w* each tribe. Write each \w man|strong="H1121"\w*’s name \w on|strong="H1973"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* staff,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* write Aaron’s name \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* staff \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w must|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* staff \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* each tribe.

Place \w the|strong="H3947"\w* staffs \w in|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H4196"\w* Meeting \w in|strong="H4196"\w* front \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* Testimony, where \w I|strong="H7126"\w* meet \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* staff belonging \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* choose \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sprout, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rid Myself \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* constant grumbling \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H4191"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* spoke \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* leaders \w gave|strong="H4872"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* staff—\w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* leaders \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* tribes, twelve staffs \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron’s staff \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w placed|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* staffs \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Testimony.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* next \w day|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* entered \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Testimony \w and|strong="H4872"\w* saw \w that|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron’s staff, representing \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Levi, \w had|strong="H4872"\w* sprouted, put \w forth|strong="H6440"\w* buds, blossomed, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* produced almonds.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w brought|strong="H4872"\w* \w out|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* staffs \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s presence \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Israelites. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* saw \w them|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* each man took \w his|strong="H3068"\w* own staff.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Moses, “\w Put|strong="H3615"\w* Aaron’s staff back \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Testimony, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H6440"\w* kept \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* rebellious, \w so|strong="H2063"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w may|strong="H5307"\w* \w put|strong="H3615"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* \w end|strong="H3615"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* grumbling \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Me|strong="H6440"\w*, lest \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w die|strong="H5307"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* commanded \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Israelites \w declared|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, “\w Look|strong="H2009"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* perishing! \w We|strong="H2009"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* lost; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H5414"\w* lost!

Anyone \w who|strong="H5975"\w* comes \w near|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* tabernacle \w of|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*. \w Are|strong="H5975"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H4191"\w* going \w to|strong="H4191"\w* perish?”
